Questions at the booking 
appointment
At your booking appointment 
you will be asked a lot of 
questions to build up a picture 
of you and your pregnancy. 
This is so that you are given 
the support you need and any 
risks are spotted early. You will 
probably want to ask a lot of 
questions yourself.
You may be asked about:
• your health and any family 
health issues;
• any previous illnesses and 
operations;
• details of any previous 
pregnancies or 
miscarriages;
• your and
